sentences.sContent: Home visits when the meet again tears demobilization yes, yes right mother's thoughts.
sentences.sContent_eng: Home visits when the meet again tears demobilization yes, yes right mother's thoughts.
sentences.sCn: 探家复员时重逢的泪水是，是对母亲的思念。

sentences.sContent: Experience with demobilization and rehabilitation programs shows that young combatants can reconstruct their lives with job training and also medical and psychological support.
sentences.sContent_eng: Experience with demobilization and rehabilitation programs shows that young combatants can reconstruct their lives with job training and also medical and psychological support.
sentences.sCn: 复员和自新计划的经验表明，少年兵可以通过职业培训以及医疗和心理支持，重新构建他们的生活。

sentences.sContent: Other sources of extra-budgetary income include funds from the central government and local governments for defense mobilization preparations, conscription, and demobilization.
sentences.sContent_eng: Other sources of extra-budgetary income include funds from the central government and local governments for defense mobilization preparations, conscription, and demobilization.
sentences.sCn: 其他预算外进项来源包括来自中央和地方用于防卫动员的准备工作、征兵以及复员安排的资金。

remMethod.val: 来自demobilize(v. 复员)， de + mobilize(动员) → 动员回家 → 复员

words.tran: 遣散军队；实行复员（等于demobilize）
